function_call.name: eval_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":["Direct interactions with employees and customers can facilitate the spread of contagious diseases.","Allowing employees to use company resources for personal work and experimentation may lead to unhygienic conditions and increased risk of disease transmission.","Rapid deployment of resources and reconfiguration of business systems may lead to oversight of health and safety measures, increasing the risk of disease spread.","High risk of contagion in a closed fitness studio environment","Increased reliance on telemedicine without proper training and protocols","Potential spread of contagious diseases in the workplace due to close proximity of employees.","Risk of economic collapse for smes due to prolonged closures and reduced consumer activity.","Increased reliance on delivery and logistics networks","Physical store crowding and safety management","Increased online shopping due to the covid-19 pandemic","High cost of implementing complex technologies for social interaction and sensory input in online shops.","The potential spread of contagious diseases through touch-based interfaces and remote human interaction technologies.","Transmission of contagious diseases through physical contact with actuator technology.","Reduced focus on hygiene and social distancing measures due to increased reliance on digital experiences.","Increased waiting lines and congestion at store entrances due to limited capacity.","Use of humanoid service robots in retail environments may lead to increased physical interactions and close contact, contributing to the spread of contagious diseases.","Reduced social interaction due to social distancing measures in shopping environments.","Closure of retail establishments leading to economic impact","Increased cooperation between government and financial sector may lead to efficient management of economic crises.","Potential spread of contagious diseases due to increased foot traffic in restaurants and cafes","Resurgence of covid-19 due to relaxation of restrictions"],"non-risks":["Managers not providing complete understanding of agility capabilities","Lack of strategic sensitivity in service smes","Lack of focus on digitalization-related changes","Lack of remote patient inspection and consulting capability","Closure of fitness centers","Lack of agility in decision-making processes","Lack of leadership unity and commitment to difficult decisions in times of turbulence","Lack of trust and safety among top management affecting leadership unity","Inadequate co-creation capabilities","Loss of flexibility in highly efficient companies due to focus on increasing efficiency","Failure to rapidly implement resource allocation and competency adjustments in response to opportunities","Inability to transform organizational assets to sustain flexibility and growth","Difficulties in maintaining food safety standards and hygiene practices","Lack of proactive actions in crisis phase","Citizens under 20 likely to carry the virus without symptoms and infect others","Restriction of public places and businesses","Lack of vaccination availability"]}
